name: Slow Cooker Beef Barley Soup
author: HCHImCBb
summary: A slow cooker makes this the easiest recipe ever. It has become a regular family favorite. So much so, that I was requested to bring it to Christmas Eve dinner. I usually use leftover boneless beef short ribs.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds boneless lean beef, cubed
directions: In a skillet over medium heat, saute the beef in the oil for 5 minutes, or until browned
Stir in the salt, pepper and garlic powder and place seasoned meat in a slow cooker
Add a little water to the skillet and stir to pick up the browned bits
Add the broth, water, celery, carrots, green onions, parsley and barley
Cover and cook on low setting for 6 to 8 hours, or until the vegetables and barley are tender
Add the thyme just before serving
